Name: Bee Sting
Ingredients: 25 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
7.5 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale
Review: Delicately spirituous spiced honeyed apple interplay in this long, refreshing cocktail.
History: Adapted from a cocktail discovered in 2005 at The Royal Exchange Grand Café & Bar in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Bee Sting contains 166 calories
